definition: Zuma (name)/Jacob Zuma (1942-), South African ANC politician, vice-president 1999-2005, president 2009-2018
ancestor/forefather/grandparents
surname Zu
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: So Mr Zuma will have less money to play with.
sentences.chinese: 因此，祖马今后可以玩弄的钱财资本将是越来越少。

sentences.english: But this could not be construed as Zuma will be the future political tide shore road width.
sentences.chinese: 但这并不能理解为祖马未来的政治道路就会潮平岸阔。

sentences.english: President Jacob Zuma has vowed to do just that.
sentences.chinese: 祖马总统也呼吁惩治腐败。

sentences.english: South African Foreign Minister Dlamini Zuma greeted Wen at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 南非外长祖马到机场迎接。

sentences.english: A pensive Egyptian sits in front of the Luxor Temple.
sentences.chinese: 一个沉思的埃及人坐在埃及祖马寺庙的前面。

sentences.english: Zuma appeared to anoint his deputy for the job.
sentences.chinese: 祖马好像在为他的副手担任总统的职务进行铺垫。

sentences.english: The wily Mr Zuma will, of course, do his utmost to avoid such an eventuality.
sentences.chinese: 聪明的祖马当然会尽全力避免这一情况的发生。

sentences.english: The 65-year-old Zuma has previously married five times and is believed to have 14 children.

definition: African National Congress, ANC/abbr. for 非洲人國民大會|非洲人国民大会[Fei1 zhou1 ren2 guo2 min2 da4 hui4]
